name: FLOWERS FROM THE POTTING SHED
description: Hi. I am a local based florist with 18 years experience. I offer bespoke flowers for all occasions, weddings, funerals, birthdays, Anniversaries and much more. You will recieve a very personal service and I aim to work to a budget that suits you. Gift bouquets start from as Little as Â£25 upwards. Wedding flowers will be quoted upon appointment. I offer local deliveries and doorstep collections. Require 2-3 days notice for flowers.
